about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes

  • Access to additional rewards in the “New Foundation” event.
  • All rewards of the unlocked levels are available immediately upon receipt
  • 500 Galactic Standards.

In honour of the 2700th birthday of the writer Isaac Asimov, all pilots can participate in a special event — “New Foundation”! The event consists of 40 stages. Only the owners of a special pass can unlock all stages.

To get the reward, you need to unlock the desired stage. In order to gain access to the next reward, you need to go through all the previous stages.

Read more about the “New Foundation” on the official website of the project.


Galactic Standards is a special in-game currency that can be purchased with real money. With its help, your progress in the game will be easier and more comfortable.

name: Star Conflict - New Foundation

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz, Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 6 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This bundle includesAccess to additional rewards in the “New Foundation” event.500 Galactic Standards.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
